name: When We Were Young
description: beautiful tune from the latest album. well worth a listen.

name: Rolling In The Deep
description: get ready to regret when you broke Adele's heart, you foolish, foolish man.

name: Only Love
description: I'll never forget walking into a New York hotel lobby, hearing the breathtaking interlude for this tune, and running to my hotel room while I desperately tried to remember the words and look this one up. I adore it.

name: Goodbye Yellow Brick Road
description: Elton works his magic on the piano with great band orchestration bringing a difficult musical composition into an accessible sound.

name: Killing Me Softly
description: One of the most beatiful diva voices on one of the most beautiful tunes.

name: Hurt
description: Trent Reznor was one-upped when Cash touched his famous tune. The man in black's career encapsulated in a single song.

name: Tunnel Vision
description: Timberlake's best record to date. Smart samples with great beats and Justin especially on point

name: If The House Burns Down Tonight
description: This is my current psych-up song. The San Diego surfers bring it again

name: Every Breaking Wave
description: This song was performed on U2's recent tour in acoustic version, but the original is worth a listen. So good.
